description.value:
Effect The mech’s onboard computer has a tier equal to [[max(1,floor(@details.tier/2))]] = half the mech’s tier (minimum 1). The computer also gains the @UUID[Compendium.mech-things.mech-upgrades.Item.9WzBqXSkUXsNuK7X]{alarm countermeasure} and one of the following upgrades or countermeasures: @UUID[Compendium.mech-things.mech-upgrades.Item.uUBpVQdA8GfzYc9q]{artificial personality}, @UUID[Compendium.mech-things.mech-upgrades.Item.kAvc4XbZNoXoMnxN]{feedback}, @UUID[Compendium.mech-things.mech-upgrades.Item.G0PE1SyH47FsxYsT]{hardened}, @UUID[Compendium.mech-things.mech-upgrades.Item.PVdEZl3QZqaC7Y1j]{security II}, or @UUID[Compendium.mech-things.mech-upgrades.Item.mZ3kGNzGu5HtgNBG]{shock grid (rank 2)}.

Cost 1/2 × tier

Special Purchasing this upgrade doesn’t increase the cost of subsequent superior computer upgrades.

system.special: The mech’s onboard computer has a tier equal to 1 = half the mech’s tier (minimum 1).
